title: Honoring the Green Toad Bookstore of Oneonta upon the occasion of receiving the Otsego County Chamber/Excellus BCBS 5th Annual Breakthrough Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION honoring the Green Toad Bookstore of Oneonta upon
the  occasion  of  receiving the Otsego County Chamber/Excellus BCBS 5th
Annual Breakthrough Award

WHEREAS, It is the sense of  this  Legislative  Body  to  recognize  the
achievements  of  those  individuals  and businesses which substantially
contribute to the economic vitality of their communities and the  entire
Empire State; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to honor  the
Green Toad Bookstore of Oneonta upon the occasion of receiving the Otse-
go  County Chamber/Excellus BCBS 5th Annual Breakthrough Award on Thurs-
day, October 14, 2010; and
  WHEREAS, This particular award celebrates the true backbone of upstate
New York and the nation's economy; and
  WHEREAS, The Green Toad Bookstore hosts author  signings,  book  group
meetings,  poetry  readings, story telling for children and anticipated-
release parties; in early 2010, the Green Toad Bookstore was awarded the
2010 WNBA Pannell Award in the General Bookstore category; and
  WHEREAS, Opening in 2008, the Green  Toad  Bookstore  was  a  lifelong
dream  of  Michele Pondolfino; the store is a social gathering place for
community members to read books and check their e-mail; and
  WHEREAS, It is with great pleasure that this Legislative Body acknowl-
edges this exceptional business and its contributions to the  local  and
state  economies,  fully  confident  that  it will continue to enjoy the
sparkling successes it has experienced thus far; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor the Green Toad Bookstore of Oneonta upon the occasion of receiving
the  Otsego  County Chamber/Excellus BCBS 5th Annual Breakthrough Award;
and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Michele Pondolfino, founder and owner of the Green Toad Book-
store.
